overview: Claude, police sergeant detective, is called to a small village to investigate the mysterious disappearance of a man in his forties. One evening, after a few days in the village, a clue leads her to meet Nina, a young singer whose charm will upset the course of her investigation.
tagline: Claude, police sergeant detective, is called to a small village to investigate the mysterious disappearance of a man in his forties.
title: Light blind
